VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: flameball
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Generate a small fragile pod of magma as the caster lobs the projectile away. Upon impact, the liquid bursts forth in a small radius.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: self explosion
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Creates a brief-lived incendiary vortex skipgate around the caster that is connected to hidden reservoirs of pressurized flammable gas. As the gas escapes, it ignites and spreads rapidly, dealing little direct damage but will set almost everything it touches on fire.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: explosion
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Generates a brief, micro skipgate within underground reservoirs of unrefined organic chemicals, along with a tiny spark at the designated location. Burning gas bursts forth in a large radius and elements of chemfuel spurt out uncontrollably.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: fire shield
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Creates a temporary incendiary vortex skipgate around a target that links to a nearby star that extends outward by a few inches. Anyone that attempts to attack the target in melee will be set ablaze, with the additional benefit of overpowering any other fire effects.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: breathe flame
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Generates a brief, unidirectional skipgate within underground reservoirs of unrefined organic chemicals, along with a tiny spark in front of the caster’s mouth. Jets of blazing, unrefined chemfuel streak forth setting everything on fire.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: eye blast
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Generates two micro, unidirectional skipgates in front of the caster’s eyes which link to a nearby white dwarf. Targeting a location to prevent overshooting, the blinding energy shoots forth and sets a small area ablaze.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: extinguish flames
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Generates skipgates linked to passing nearby ships that “misplaces” the firefoam contained in the ship’s fire suppression system. As there is a lot to “borrow”, the radius is quite impressive.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: meteor shower
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Introduces gravitational distortions in orbiting meteoroids and space debris to strike a location of the caster’s choosing. These come in groups of 4 to ensure optimal control and devastation.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: fire beam
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Introduces glitches into a network of power-collection satellites to begin beaming power down in a massive column of electromagnetic energy. This lasts until the satellites detect the glitch and temporarily shut themselves down.

VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.label: fire tornado
VFECore.Abilities.AbilityDef.description: Overrides the systems of a network of weather-control satellites to cause a massive air current disturbance. While the effect is active, the caster also inserts skipgates within the eye of the resulting tornado that spits out thermal energies from deep within the planet.
